name: bedrock-development
description: APIs for creating and editing files related to Minecraft Bedrock development.

scripts.clean-dir: rm -rf ./behavior_packs && rm -rf ./resource_packs && mkdir -p behavior_packs/test_bp && mkdir -p resource_packs/test_rp
scripts.docs: npx typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --plugin typedoc-github-wiki-theme ts/app/index.ts --out docs/api --readme none && mv docs/api/Home.md docs/api/API.md && find docs/api -type f -exec sed -i 's/wiki\/Home/wiki\/API/g' {} \;
scripts.test: npm run clean-dir && npm run build && node . new entity -c test && node . new item -t attachable test && node . new block test

author: Caleb Coldiron
